As you saw we get the shellcode return address and then add 100 characters x90 for filling the buffer
As the final part of the buffer is the address in which our malicious exploit is stored

badfile           exploit.c  README.md       stack.c
call_shellcode.c  lab.json   set_uid_root.c
Pay attention to the strcpy function there on bof()
If we overflow its buffer (517 characters) with trash data and then put the return address of exploit.c, we can call the function!
